intent_atoms.description: Validation rules VR-001…VR-015 must emit ParseIssue records when tolerant parsing is enabled while preserving strict-mode behavior.
Extend ParseIssueStore aggregation to expose per-severity counts for tolerant parsing dashboards and streaming summaries.
ParsePipeline converts validation diagnostics into issues, records them in ParseIssueStore, and existing tests cover the new tolerant flow.
VoiceOver regression pass must confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.
Secure Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG-H fixtures so regression baselines can shift from synthetic payloads once approvals land.
Surface ParseIssueStore metrics in SwiftUI ribbons once tolerant parsing UI specs are finalized.

functional_units.name: ParseIssueStore

functional_units.name: ParsePipeline
functional_units.description: Converts validation diagnostics into ParseIssue records and records them in ParseIssueStore

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing UI Ribbons

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Shortcuts Verification
